overview: When misfortune hits hard on the Jordan family of Chicago's upper class, Bonnie Jordan, a dazzling and witty girl, finds a job as an aspiring reporter; however, his naive younger brother Rodney takes a twisted path and gets involved with the wrong people.
tagline: She Dances Her Way from the Gayest Social Whirl to Grimmest Underworld!
title: Dance, Fools, Dance
